name: Björn Lindström
bio: Python was among the first programming languages I started learning, and since then I've used it for fun, in an academic setting, as well as in my work life.

name: Bethany Garcia
bio: Python lover. Instigator. Chaser of shiny objects.

name: Brian Beach
bio: I've been coding in Python off and on for 20 years.  It's still my favorite language for many tasks.
